Description:
Detects suspicious filenames that contain a right-to-left override character and a potentially spoofed file extensions.


Author: Jonathan Peters (Nextron Systems), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential File Extension Spoofing Using Right-to-Left Override
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%\u202e%' and (filepath like '%fpd..%' or filepath like '%nls..%' or filepath like '%vsc..%' or filepath like '%xcod.%' or filepath like '%xslx.%'))
